explains: adj. 前所未有的，史无前例的；（大小、数量、程度等）前所未知的，空前的
wordGroup: unprecedented scale 史无前例的规模

sentences.en: The mission has been hailed as an unprecedented success.
sentences.cn: 这次使命已被宣布为一次空前的成功。

sentences.en: We are now witnessing an unprecedented increase in violent crime.
sentences.cn: 我们现在看到暴力犯罪空前增多。

sentences.en: Such policies would require unprecedented cooperation between nations.
sentences.cn: 这样的一些政策会要求国与国之间前所未有的合作。
